title: 820-00165 Shorted PP3V3
message: Im driving myself loco here, the board is clean except for U8005 witch had very little corrosion under it, that is now removed and short still there on PP3V3_SUS, but also PP1V05SO_LL is shorted, also PP1V05S0_AGND is shorted, I have tried injecting voltage and the PS goes as high as 2amps but nothing gets hot, injecting 3v on PP3V3_SUS makes the CPU get hot.

title: 820-00165 Shorted PP3V3
message: If PP3v3_SUS and PP1v05 are shorted, likely CPU issue both are connected to the CPU. PP1V05S0_AGND is GND btw, so that rail doesn't matter lol.

title: 820-00165 Shorted PP3V3
message: [USER="1153"]JohnB8812[/USER] Thanks, GND stands for ground what a tonto I am lol.  Is there anyway I can test something else to see if indeed it is the CPU?

title: 820-00165 Shorted PP3V3
message: Pull every component on PP3v3_SUS besides the CPU. If still shorted then RIP

title: 820-00165 Shorted PP3V3
message: If CPU gets hot injecting voltage on 3V3_SUS, no other reason than dead CPU; PCH side I suppose...
